snippet: Scientists in Connecticut, home to perhaps the only preserve devoted to the 17-year periodical cicadas, are using GIS-GPS technology to map the insect’s populations with pinpoint accuracy.
abstract: Magicicada Preserve in Hamden, Conn, created by entomologist Charles Lee Remington, is world's only preserve dedicated to 17-year periodical cicada Magicicada septendecim; preserve was created year before 1996 emergence to raise awareness of cicadas, and their special biology, in untouched habitat.
lead_paragraph: Scientists in Connecticut, home to perhaps the only preserve devoted to the 17-year periodical cicadas, are using GIS-GPS technology to map the insect’s populations with pinpoint accuracy.

headline.seo: One Place Cicadas Get a Warm Welcome
headline.main: Here, Cicadas Get a Warm Welcome
headline.print_headline: Here, Cicadas Get a Warm Welcome
